moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 dxc4 3. e3: 3. e4 is a better move, but if you feel that your opponent is not such a good player 3. e3 might work as well
moves.3... b5 4. a4 a6: black shouldn't try to keep the c4 pawn at all! both 4...a6 as in the game and 4...c6 are awkward; after 4...c6, 5.axb5 cxb5 6.Qf3, capturing a piece, will fallow
moves.5. axb5 axb5: ?? why offer the rook for nothing?
moves.7... bxc4 8. Qa4+ Qd7: 8.Bd7 looses the queen and the knight
